long_description: Perfect for stand up paddleboarding, the O'Neill Superlite(TM) wetsuit jacket keeps you having fun thanks to its lightweight, easy protection. Helps eliminate evaporative heat loss and protect against hypothermia if you capsize in chilly water. Stretchy 2mm neoprene forms to your body for a flexible, comfortable fit; flatseam construction prevents chafing. Hand wash the O'Neill Superlite wetsuit jacket in cold water, drip dry out of sun and store in a cool, dry place.
short_description: Perfect for stand up paddleboarding, the O'Neill Superlite(TM) wetsuit jacket keeps you having fun thanks to its lightweight, easy protection.
